// location of the back end weather saves
var baseURL='http://localhost:3000/api/weathersaves/';export var getWeathers=function getWeathers(){return fetch(baseURL).then(function(res){return res.json();});};export var postWeather=function postWeather(payload){return fetch(baseURL,{method:'POST',body:JSON.stringify(payload),headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}}).then(function(res){return res.json();});};export var deleteWeather=function deleteWeather(id){console.log(id);return fetch(baseURL+id,{method:'DELETE'});};
